title: The Bay
overview: THE BAY follows the affluent, yet dysfunctional Bay City residents living in a town cursed by Red Garrett, an ominous senator who was murdered by his socialite granddaughter, Sara Garrett. Living in his shadow, Sara, her son Pete, and those around them face a series of dilemmas involving rape, blackmail, sordid lovers, and vindictive arch rivals. Their lives riddled with forbidden love, malicious lies, and never-ending scandals, the town's privileged tangle with those who confuse obsession for love, vengeance for justice, and power for success.The Bay (a.k.a. The Bay The Series) is a digital/web daytime drama series that premiered on September 15, 2010, at Blip.tv and later moved to Amazon Prime. For its sixth season, the series ran on Popstar! TV.
